subject: Implement Phase 3 Compare Mode - State & Storage Foundation
body:
Add core infrastructure for the Compare Mode feature:

- Create utils/storage.js with localStorage persistence for saved comparisons
  - Version-tracked storage format with 20 comparison limit
  - Export (JSON/CSV) and import functionality
  - Comparison summary generation for side-by-side view

- Extend state/app-state.js with comparison management
  - savedComparisons array in state
  - Action creators: save, load, delete, update, clear comparisons
  - UI state for comparison view and modal

- Add Save as Option UI in calculator.js
  - Save Actions Bar with Save/View/Compare buttons
  - Save Modal with name and notes input
  - Auto-generated default names from model/variant
  - Reactive UI updates on comparison changes

This completes Sub-phases 3.1 (State & Storage) and 3.2 (Save UI).
Next: comparison-manager.js and comparison-view.js components.
